title: All under heaven: life in a chinese village (TEFC)
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/China - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - China
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Long Bow Trilogy". An intimate look at daily life in Long Bow - a village 600 kilometres south-west of Beijing. Ancient traditions persist - we see an elaborate funeral, a country fair, a local animal market and an open air opera. But changes have come to Long Bow, with the shift from collective to individual farming. A sense of dramatic change accompanies the simple rhythms of rural life. Part one of The Long Bow trilogy.
